body: 1520348 Me and my friend want to try threesome, do you want with us? Register on ( litelink.at/n_hent ) and write me your name
DBD you appear when we needed you the most, thank you.

To summarize, it's a story involved love triangle and demonstrated the complex of love.

For the background, the main character is a penguin who is a poet, the man is his friend who is the postman who normally deliver the letters to the penguin, and the women is the fan of penguin who really understand his poems and want to marry him.
Through the development of story, the women can't satisfied the life with the penguin, and  postman notice it and seduce the women. However, the purpose of the postman is not just for sex, also involved the feeling of jealous and intention of revenge to women for taking penguin away from him.
At the end, penguin try to go out but get sick as a cost, and women leave the penguin by the excuse of "I have to follow my parent's will to marry the man they assigned, and I just be with you for you paying my cost of living"
I can't describe the artistic conception of this story very well. Hope someone translate it someday.
why do i have a feeling that this story will stuck in my head and scar me for a long time. rn i can't understand shit cuz it's chinese
Every bird avatar nowadays give me pun pun vibes and I don't like that at all
Glad penguin chan didn't do anything
